DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Physical Status III ( ASA I Healthy , ASA II mild control systemic disease ) Singleton pregnancies 3642 week gestation Nonlabouring Scheduled cesarean delivery English speaking Age 1845 year Cardiovascular disease Hypertensive disease pregnancy ( i.e . mild & severe preeclampsia ) Allergy phenylephrine , standardized medication Obesity ( BMI > 35 kg/m2 ) Diabetes Mellitus type 1 Smoker Coffee/Caffeine intake within 6 hour SDF measurement
